title: 1. Learn & Choose
text: Explore bite-size nutrition education — like understanding macros, healthy swaps, and portion control — then pick your health focus (e.g., heart health, diabetes, weight management).

title: 2. Receive a Healthy Plan
text: NutriBridge generates a weekly meal plan with budget-friendly recipes, nutrition insights (calorie counts, swaps), and a simple one-step guide to stay on track.

title: 3. Try It & See Results
text: Apply the plan, use built-in progress markers (like check-ins or meal completions), save everything locally — and build healthier, long-lasting habits.
